subject: You can now complete your finance application for your Howdens goods purchase

rows.text: You can now complete your purchase of your Howdens goods from {{extras.trader.contact_name}} via finance. Click below to choose which finance option you want to apply for and complete the application. You'll receive a decision in a few minutes and we'll keep both your builder and Howdens updated.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at howdens@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.
